name: ebook-unit-converter
description: User inserts ebooks and chooses beetween imperic or metric system. Owl picks up his pen and starts cramming. Users gets his freshly converted ebooks

scripts.dev: sass --watch my.sass:dist/my.css & puer -p 3000 --no-launch & watchify my.js -v -t babelify -o dist/my.js

author: Vik Borges
